

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE, include= FALSE}


library(tidyverse) # for data wrangling and file download
library(knitr) # for the kable function
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
```


```{r w2_tab, results='asis', echo = FALSE, include=FALSE}
w2_tab <- read_excel("./figures/w2_p_table.xlsx", sheet = "top10", na = "NA") %>% 
  dplyr::select(Ensemble_gene_id, log2FC, Hgnc_symbol, Gene_Ontology, Reference, Species)


w2_tab %>% 
  kable(format = "html",
        caption = "Timew2pre") %>% 
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", font_size = 25) %>% 
  print()
```
